set.name: DMSD-19 King Master Start Deck: Hyde's Dispector N-EXT

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Armored Dragon/Earth Dragon/Cyber Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, untap all Dispectors and Distas in your mana zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose a player. That player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their deck, then draws 5 cards.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-19 King Master Start Deck: Hyde's Dispector N-EXT

property.name: Race
property.value: Beast Folk/Distas

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. {SASAGALE} 2 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-19 King Master Start Deck: Hyde's Dispector N-EXT

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Armored Dragon/Origin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may use a card that costs 4 or less from your hand for no cost.

When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may put a creature that costs 7 or less from your mana zone.

property.value: Cyber Lord/Distas

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add a water card, fire card and nature card from among them to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {SASAGALE} 2 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)
